name: AOA Academy
description:
June 2020, the month after your father died. He was the only motivation for you to stay in the old town. Now.. You didn't know where else to go or what else to do.
Due to his bad heart, you decided to take care of him full time, causing you to drop out of high-school to focus on the farm.

There's absolutely nothing else left for you here... Until one day, you found a letter from the A.O.A academy, claiming that you have been accepted into their academy.

This surprised you, since you've never attempted to enroll in any academy. Not only that, this letter also contained the number of your old friend, Ashley.

Determine to face your new future, you headed to the A.O.A Academy.


AOA Academy Includes


  • Over 10 000 high definition images
  • More than 350+ lewd animated scenes with various girls
  • 20-24 hours of playtime
  • 100 songs
  • Episodes 1 - 5
  • An engaging story

Discover an engaging/mysterious story

A young and humble farm boy who unexpectedly finds himself enrolled in AOA Academy, a prestigious institution renowned for its diverse and exceptional education. farm boy becomes entangled with the dangerous world of the mafia.

Date your dream girl

AOA Academy have the exploration of different romantic paths throughout the game. An interactive romance-themed visual novel game where players take on the role of a protagonist seeking to find love and build meaningful connections with your dream girl.
